thoughts.text: I will use the read_file command to retrieve the job postings from the file.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the read_file command will allow me to retrieve the job postings from the file and filter out irrelevant job postings.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the read_file command to retrieve the job postings from the file
- Filter out irrelevant job postings
- Prioritize job postings that are most likely to be a good fit based on experience and desired work environment
thoughts.criticism: I need to ensure that I am filtering out irrelevant job postings effectively to save on short term memory usage.
thoughts.speak: I will use the read_file command to retrieve the job postings from the file, filter out irrelevant job postings, and prioritize job postings that are most likely to be a good fit based on experience and desired work environment.
